dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Greetings, traveler. What brings you to my humble village?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm on a quest to find the legendary sword Excalibur.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, Excalibur. A powerful weapon, indeed. But it is said to be guarded by a fierce dragon.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Very well. I wish you luck on your quest.
